title: Wayland panic and crash

labels.name: A-Windowing
labels.description: Platform-agnostic interface layer to run your app in

labels.name: O-Linux
labels.description: Specific to the Linux desktop operating system

body:
## Bevy version bevy 0.12.1 ## \[Optional\] Relevant system information Ubuntu 23.10, all packages are up to date. Rust: 1.75.0 (stable) ```ignore AdapterInfo { name: "NVIDIA GeForce MX130", vendor: 4318, device: 5965, device_type: DiscreteGpu, driver: "NVIDIA", driver_info: "535.129.03", backend: Vulkan } SystemInfo { os: "Linux 23.10 Ubuntu", kernel: "6.5.0-14-generic", cpu: "Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8350U CPU @ 1.70GHz", core_count: "4", memory: "31.2 GiB" } ``` The system is running with the `on-demand` PRIME profile. ## What you did Try to run my own app or any examples with the wayland feature. ## What went wrong Crash or panic ## Additional information full screen: ```ignore
